about_the_game:
Dark Data: Zero takes you on a perilous journey through an alternate timeline of the near-future. Play as Poisson, a reclusive hacker, who gets caught up in a nefarious plot while enjoying his summer vacation. Engage in an unfolding story-mode taking place a mere month before the events of "Dark Data", a mid-nineties unreleased film. Discover the origins of Poisson's penchant for violence and unyielding grit as you traverse a world twisted to the will of a man obsessed with an ancient and dark knowledge.

A toxic catalyst has spread throughout Lower-Detroit, plunging the metropolis into a mutant infested nightmare. Can you uncover the origin of this heinous act? Face off against a plethora of undead and malevolent foes in this classics-inspired love letter to 90's console shooters.

Wield an array of devastating armaments including: blades, shotguns, high-tech automatics, energy-weapons, class-A explosives, and more! Push forward through this marred world by solving puzzles, decimating hordes of enemies, and discovering long-lost secrets.

MULTIPLAYER

In addition to the story-mode, Dark Data: Zero includes a feature-packed multiplayer experience. Bring back the crowded couch and split-screen mayhem of yesteryear with up to 3 of your friends or 7 cunning AI-Bots. (8 combatants total).

content_descriptors.notes:
ANIMATED BLOOD & GORE
ANIMATED VIOLENCE
STRONG LANGUAGE
DRUG & ALCOHOL USE

detailed_description:
Dark Data: Zero takes you on a perilous journey through an alternate timeline of the near-future. Play as Poisson, a reclusive hacker, who gets caught up in a nefarious plot while enjoying his summer vacation. Engage in an unfolding story-mode taking place a mere month before the events of "Dark Data", a mid-nineties unreleased film. Discover the origins of Poisson's penchant for violence and unyielding grit as you traverse a world twisted to the will of a man obsessed with an ancient and dark knowledge.

A toxic catalyst has spread throughout Lower-Detroit, plunging the metropolis into a mutant infested nightmare. Can you uncover the origin of this heinous act? Face off against a plethora of undead and malevolent foes in this classics-inspired love letter to 90's console shooters.

Wield an array of devastating armaments including: blades, shotguns, high-tech automatics, energy-weapons, class-A explosives, and more! Push forward through this marred world by solving puzzles, decimating hordes of enemies, and discovering long-lost secrets.

MULTIPLAYER

In addition to the story-mode, Dark Data: Zero includes a feature-packed multiplayer experience. Bring back the crowded couch and split-screen mayhem of yesteryear with up to 3 of your friends or 7 cunning AI-Bots. (8 combatants total).

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: i5 or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM+
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Modern Card
  • Additional Notes: Xbox or PlayStation controller Highly Recommended, 1-4
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS 12+
  • Processor: i7 or Better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM+
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 5.1 Capable Sound Card Recommended
  • Additional Notes: Xbox or PlayStation controller Highly Recommended, 1-4

name: Dark Data: Zero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: AMD FX Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750ti or Better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Modern Card
  • Additional Notes: Xbox or PlayStation controller Highly Recommended, 1-4
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.9GHZ i5 or Better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050ti or Better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 5.1 Capable Sound Card Recommended
  • Additional Notes: Xbox or PlayStation controller Highly Recommended, 1-4

Face off against a plethora of undead and malevolent foes in this classics-inspired love letter to 90's console shooters.
